name: Cycle Online For WooCommerce
author: Cyclebit

sections.description:
Cycle Online is a crypto payment gateway for WooCommerce.
Supporting many of the most popular cryptocurrencies, such as BTC, ETH, USDT and many others!

Quickstart guide:

  1. Download and activate the plugin for your store.
  2. Enable it from WooCommerce > Settings > Payments > Cycle Online.
  3. Enter the email, secret key and server secret key received from the Cyclebit team, and if needed, configure the parameters as you wish.
  4. Now your customers will be able to pay via Cycle Online!

If you have any difficulties or suggestions, do not doubt to contact us: support@cyclebit.com
sections.faq:
How do I get my credentials?

Please fill out the form on the website or contact us at support@cyclebit.com

What about security?

External Cyclebit system is responsible for processing payments, and our plugin code is absolutely secure.

short_description: Cycle Online WooCommerce plugin for your store! Accept crypto payments with a few simple steps.

upgrade_notice.1.0.0: Install initial release of our plugin to accept crypto payments through WooCommerce :)

screenshots.caption: Activate the plugin for your store in WooCommerce > Settings > Payments
Enter the email, secret key and server secret key received from the Cyclebit team in the plugin settings
Use this functionality very carefully at your own risk
Save the settings after making changes
Now, when choosing a payment method, your customers will see a similar payment option
